name: Sultan of Rings
description:
You enter a dimly lit room. A smell of fruits, tea and hookah tobacco tingles your nose. Purple and blue smoke swirls around you, hiding silhouettes of other visitors of this Hookah Place. You enter an unspoken tournament: how much smoke rings can you blow through other smoke rings before coals of your hookah will burn out?

Rules:

A round lasts as long as the coals in your hookah - keep track of their color. For every ring you blow through another ring, you get a point. But be careful - if you inhale smoke too hard aiming may become inaccurate... Train, become the best ring blower until the coals burn out!

Controls:

  • hold Right Mouse Button - inhale smoke
  • hold Left Mouse Button - charge your smoke ring
  • release Left Mouse Button - blow a smoke ring

Dependencies:

The longer you charge your ring, the longer will it live, the slower it will move

The longer you inhale smoke... well, you will see 

Artist's Behance (chasasa): https://www.behance.net/chasasazb65d
